title: 02/10/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/10/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Ross Tucker about some of his favorite props for the 2022 Super Bowl. Troy Aikman explains why he likes Joe Burrow so much. Deion Sanders discusses how he'd fix diversity in the NFL. And Raiders Defensive End joins the guys in the studio to talk about the Pro Bowl, and how he got an extra X added to his name.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
